members.name: Transform
Interpolator
members.custom_itk_cast:
typename FilterType::InterpolatorPointerType itkInterpolator = detail::CreateInterpolator<InputImageType>( m_Interpolator );\
     filter->SetInterpolator( itkInterpolator );

custom_methods.name: SetReferenceImage
custom_methods.doc: This methods sets the output size, origin, and spacing to that of the provided image
custom_methods.body: this->SetSize( refImage.GetSize() ); this->SetOutputOrigin( refImage.GetOrigin() ); this->SetOutputSpacing( refImage.GetSpacing() );
